name: Larry Cunningham
description: '''Larry Cunningham''' (13 February 1938 â€“ 28 September 2012) was an [[Country and Irish|Irish country music]] singer, who was one of the leading figures of the [[showband]] scene in the 1960s and 1970s. Cunningham accomplished a series of "firsts" during his career. In 1964, Cunningham broke into the British charts with "Tribute to [[Jim Reeves]]", the first time an Irish artist had done such a thing.
